publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8076 Bob Doris: St Patrick’s Day Celebrations in Glasgow—That the Parliament notes that a number of events are planned throughout the city of Glasgow for the week of 12 to 19 March 2011, which includes a family fun day in the city’s Garngad, known as little Ireland, a concert in Glasgow City Halls, an Irish themed quiz in the Admiral bar, a dinner and concert held by Comhaltas Ceoltóirí Éireann Royston branch and a festival mass at Holy Cross Chapel in Govanhill; commends the work of the many committed volunteers in Glasgow’s Irish community, and wishes Scotland’s Irish diaspora a very successful St Patrick’s day. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*
S3M-8076 St Patrick’s Day Celebrations in Glasgow (lodged on 4 March 2011) Elaine Smith*
S3M-8076 St Patrick’s Day Celebrations in Glasgow (lodged on 4 March 2011) Stuart McMillan*, Hugh Henry*
